Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

SeuratIntegrate (development version)

  • Speed up Dijkstra’s algorithm-like used in ExpandNeighbours with a new c++ implementation

  • The most suited matrix format is automatically chosen for corrected counts output by integration methods (should be dense matrix most of the time)

  • Add support for scGraph metric (https://doi.org/10.1101/2024.04.02.587824)

  • Improved speed of CreateIntegrationGroups for non-SCT assay in unambiguous cases

SeuratIntegrate 0.4.0

  • Initial public release
